PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-18932009-11-26TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Various Amendments)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (VARIOUS AMENDMENTS) provides a number of minor adjustments to the existing Regulations in order to correct inconsistencies between the English and French versions, make clarifications of intent, and to reflect new technology. This amendment introduces a new means of calculating the designated seating capacity of a vehicle to include the space designed for use by a person in a wheelchair.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0318 Publication Date: 2009-12-09
